scripts.percy:homepage: set PERCY_BRANCH=multion-website-homepage && npx percy exec -- node multion_homepage.js
scripts.percy:api: set PERCY_BRANCH=multion-website-api-overview && npx percy exec -- node multion_api_overview.js
scripts.percy:api-pricing: set PERCY_BRANCH=multion-website-api-pricing && npx percy exec -- node multion_api_pricing.js
scripts.percy:all: set PERCY_BRANCH=website_all && npx percy exec -- node website_all.js
